title: Can a National Museum Rebuild Its Collection Without Colonialism?
description: After a fire destroyed thousands of Indigenous artifacts, the curators of this Brazilian museum are adopting a radical new approach.
dc:creator: Mariana Lenharo and Meghie Rodrigues
media:credit: Luisa Dörr for The New York Times
media:description: Valdomiro Osvaldo Aquino, a Guarani-Kaiowá leader, in Mato Grosso do Sul.
